channel.title: dreamhost on Dipankar's blog
channel.description: Recent content in dreamhost on Dipankar's blog

item.title: Python, Passenger phusion and dreamhost
item.description: Well, had to setup some stuff on dreamhost. Turns out that they are fairly bad on django hosting. Here is a working passenger_wsgi.py that is possibly much better than the default. Please not that you must have paste [http://pythonpaste.org/]Â installed for this to work correctly. This has python2.7 locally installed in your account, with all the libraries locally. Dreamhost is quite painful, as the documentation is incomplete clearly!
